title: The Last Station
writer: Michael Hoffman (screenplay), Jay Parini (based on the novel by)
actors: Helen Mirren, Christopher Plummer, Paul Giamatti, James McAvoy
plot: A historical drama that illustrates Russian author Leo Tolstoy's struggle to balance fame and wealth with his commitment to a life devoid of material things.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 15 nominations.
